body:
Hi A thanks for helping, I realize that inserting context volume it will not recognize polysurface but its fine with box extrusions. so the problems are 1st; if context massing needs to be more exact then the component fail to read. 2nd; not all the context requires max solar hours. for example requirement for commercial is low, for residential would be 3 hr during winters. so instead i used solar hours analysis in LB to simulate a Massing from rhino to do the task for now. but if these can combined than it should able to simulate Max of air right envelope. [
